tool_description: "University Ranking API" provides access to data and information related to the ranking of universities and higher education institutions worldwide. Such an API typically offers a wide range of information about universities, including their global and regional rankings, academic performance metrics, and other relevant data. Here's a description of what you can expect from a University Ranking API:
name: university ranking api
title: university ranking api

api_list.name: universityranking endpoint
api_list.description: The University Ranking Endpoint provides access to comprehensive university ranking information, helping users gain insights into the performance and reputation of universities worldwide. This endpoint is a crucial component of a University Ranking API, enabling users to explore rankings based on various criteria and parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://university-ranking-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-ranking-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://university-ranking-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-ranking-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
